parameters.name: blocktime
parameters.description: Duration of block in sec (default should be  3 min)

parameters.name: uselength1
parameters.description: Should length 1 be used (sort of a control condition)

parameters.name: deadline1
parameters.description: Deadline in ms for length-1 problems

parameters.name: deadline2
parameters.description: Deadline in ms for length-2 problems

parameters.name: deadline3
parameters.description: Deadline in ms for length-3 problems

parameters.name: deadline4
parameters.description: Deadline in ms for length-4 problems

parameters.name: deadline5
parameters.description: Deadline in ms for length-5 problems

parameters.name: givefeedback
parameters.description: Whether correct/incorrect feedback should be given

parameters.name: randomizeblocks
parameters.description: Should order of blocks be randomized?
